Header.title: We are
Header.paragraph: India's leading platform for DMIT, Midbrain Activation, and brain-based learning programs to unlock your child’s hidden potential.

About.paragraph: At Upgrade Your Child™, we believe every child is born with unique strengths and talents. Through scientific tools like DMIT and midbrain activation, we help children unlock their true potential. Our goal is to guide both children and parents on a journey of brain-based learning and emotional growth.

Gallery.title: Blindfold Demo on Live News Coverage
Blindfolded Child Reading Live on National News
Blindfolded Color Identification seminar at Chandrawati Public School, Bulandshahar
Blindfold Currency & Serial Number Demo in front of Principal at Alinga Public School, Jaipur
Blindfold Currency Demo at Alinga Public School, Jaipur

Services.name: DMIT Test & Report
Services.text: We provide Dermatoglyphics-based analysis to help identify your child's unique strengths and learning style.

Services.name: Midbrain Activation
Services.text: Boost focus, memory, and intuition through scientific and engaging midbrain activation techniques.

Services.name: Parent Counseling
Services.text: We guide parents to better understand and support their child’s development through one-on-one expert sessions.

Services.name: Brain Development Activities
Services.text: Fun, creative exercises that improve observation, imagination, and problem-solving skills in children.

Services.name: Career Guidance
Services.text: Based on DMIT reports, we help identify suitable future education and career paths for your child.

Services.name: Confidence Building
Services.text: We work on enhancing your child’s self-esteem and communication skills through playful learning.

Features.title: DMIT Analysis
Features.text: Discover your child’s inborn talents and learning style using fingerprint-based scientific analysis.

Features.title: Midbrain Activation
Features.text: Improve focus, memory, and intuition through fun and safe midbrain stimulation exercises.

Features.title: Parent Counseling
Features.text: Personalized guidance for parents to support their child’s growth and career planning early on.

Features.title: Child Brain Training
Features.text: Fun-based brain development programs to boost confidence, creativity, and emotional intelligence.
